articles.title: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026
articles.mainIdea: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026. JPMorgan has released its list of 47 top stock picks for 2026 that its analysts believe will crush the market in 2026. They have assigned each stock an overweight rating and given them a one-year price target for 2026. The selections cover a wide range of sectors, including technology, healthcare, financials, energy, and consumer discretionary, ... JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026 Related tickers mentioned: BFAM, CELH, GEV.
